page.title: 05NOTABLE EVENTS IN LOWESTOFT
page.content:
A major development is planned for Lowestoft in the town centre next to the library. There will be offices on higher floors and entertainment below. British Home Stores will be extending their shop and Bejam, Mothercare and Superdrug are going to have stores there. The centre is going to be called the Britten centre after the composer who was born in Lowestoft.
There has recently been an argument over whether there should be a gipsy site on Kirkley Ham. Local people signed a petition against it. Some families started camping but have been moved on and the plan has been shelved.
